column3: Gunther, can I get another cup of coffee, please
So uh, what do you do when you’re not working here
You don’t need to fill these silences
Chandler, that’s like your fourth cup of coffee
Well, I am drinking lots of cups of coffee because I’m exhausted
It’s not something to be proud of, okay
You have to go to a sleep clinic
Look, I told ya, I’m not going to any clinic
I don’t have a problem, you’re the one with the problem
You should go to a "Quit being a baby and leave me alone" clinic
Quit being a baby and leave me alone
There, you’ve just had your first class
Y’know I used to go out with this guy that was a really light sleeper, and whenever I started to snore, he would just roll me over…
He would just roll me over and I would stop snoring
Next time you snore, I’m rolling ya over
I gotta do what I gotta do, you gotta do what you gotta do, you just do it
Have you guys picked a date yet
I still cannot believe you’re engaged
Just ‘cause its happening so fast; not ‘cause you’re such a loser
Ugh, she’s upstairs not doing the dishes
I’m not doing them this time
I don’t care if those dishes sit in the sink until they’re all covered with—I’ll do them when I get home
Hey listen umm, Emily found this wedding dress in London…
Well, luckily there’s a store here that has one left in her size, but I’m the groom, I’m not supposed to see the dress…
I’ll pick it up for you
Oh, she’s got you running errands, y’know, picking up wedding dresses…  Wah-pah
Hey, Mon, I was just doing the dishes
Hey, do uh, do you have a minute
Yeah, yeah, I was just about to take a break anyways, so…
So listen uh, I know you and I haven’t really had a chance to talk since uh, Emily and I decided to get married, and uh, I was just wondering how you were
I know if you were getting married I’d feel, kinda…
Definitely, well it definitely took me by surprise, but I’m okay
All right, I just wanted to check
And I-I know someday this will happen for you too
Oh, no, I didn’t mean, uh…
I mean maybe you didn’t hear about a serious relationship called me and Joshua
Oh, I thought you guys had just been on like four dates, I didn’t realise that had become anything, yet
Oh, no-no-no, no-no-no, it has become, it has—yeah
Oh no, those were four great dates
And I mean, the connection, I mean y’know, emotionally, mentally, physically…
It’s like I’m right there with Joshua
You are right there with Emily
And it’s y’know, it’s kinda like…
Well, I gotta get, I gotta get back to the dishes
Hey, y’know, y’know what would make me really happy
If like the four of us could all y’know, hang out together
Uh, in fact Emily’s coming into town this weekend, why don’t you say we all have dinner
Yeah, all right, it’s a date
Yeah, but y’know, about have of these are gonna end up getting divorced
Oh, yes, umm, I’m here to pick up a dress that you have on hold
Would you like to try it on Ms
You’re the most beautiful bride I’ve ever seen
And could I get my ring back
All right buddy, time to roll over
You are going to a clinic
You’re going to a clinic, and a pyjama store
Can you just hold on for one minute
No, you have to let me in right now
I didn’t know I had to stay up all night before I went to this stupid sleep clinic
Hey, I hear that you and Joshua are going out to dinner with Ross and Emily, and I think that’s, I think that’s really cool
Yeah, Rach, I think you’re handling that really well
What do you mean, handling it
Now, maybe I would have a problem with this if it wasn’t for me and Joshua
Y’know, they’re not gonna get married anyway
They rushed into this thing so fast it’s ridiculous
I mean, they’re gonna be engaged for like what
And somewhere along the way, one of them is gonna realise what they’ve done and they’re call the whole thing off
I’m telling ya, you’re gonna be dancing at my wedding before you’re dancing at there’s
Yeah, well, I don’t dance at weddings
Because weddings are a great place to meet women, and when I dance, I look like this…
So, what are you guys doing four weeks from today
Because Emily and I are getting married in a month

Yeah, Emily always wanted to get married in this beautiful place that her parents got married, but it’s going to be torn down, so… I mean, I-I know it’s crazy, but everything up ‘til now has been so crazy, and I don’t know, this just feels right
That’s the day after I stop menstruating
You’re voice sounded all squeaky on the phone
Ohh, nothing, I just wanted to see you
I’m more than okay, I am really, really happy
‘Cause I am really happy about us
I think we are, I think we are so on the right track
I mean, I think we are working, I think we are clicking
Yeah-yeah, y’know if-if there was just like one little area where I—that I think we need—we would need to work on; I-I would think it was we’re just not crazy enough
I-I gotta say, I-I-I-I’m not too sure I agree with that
Yeah, you’re right, I mean, we no, we have our fun
But if ……I mean, I mean like craaaazy
This is gonna, this is gonna sound y’know, a little umm, hasty, but uh, just go with it
Oh, I know, I know, it’s-it’s so, it’s so totally like, "Whoa
" Y’know, I mean, but I mean it just feels right
I mean, it just feels right, don’t you think
Uhh, Rachel uhh, you’re a real special lady, but my divorce isn’t final yet and, and, and we’ve been on four days, so I’m thinking "No, but thanks
Um-hmm, and did you stay up all night in preparation for your sleep study
Alll right, we’ll call you in a few minutes
You’re coming on to the entire room
So uh, what are you in for
What a coincidence, I listen in my sleep
So why don’t you give me your number
I’m not gonna right to you
My big concern is what’s real
Well, at least you didn’t rent yours from a store called, "It’s Not Too Late
Okay, throw it straight this time
I hate my regular clothes now
I look down and-and I know that this isn’t gonna be the most special day of my life
I mean it was kinda fun for a while, but didn’t you start feeling silly
So, is Joey gonna stop snoring
A beautiful woman agreed to go out with me
Joey wanted to ask her out, but uh, she picked me
Well she’s, she’s the kinda girl—Joey was unconscious
Oh, they gave it to me at the sleep clinic, and it’s gonna help me not to snore
Well, are you asleep right now, Joe
‘Cause I don’t think you have to wear it unless you are
I know I don’t have too
Well, I did my best to convince him that I’m not some crazy girl who is dying to get married—I’m just going through a hard time
Well uh, his answering machine was very understanding
Hey, I bet you anything that he’s gonna call you again
Yeah, maybe, but I don’t think I even care
I don’t think he’s the one I’m sad about
Y’know, I know that I said that I am totally okay with Ross getting married, but as it turns out, I don’t think I’m handling it all that well
And I-I am just trying to figure out why
Well, yeah, y’know how Ross and I were on again, off again, on again, off again
I guess I just figured that somewhere down the road, we would be on again
So, I got us some reservations for Sunday night, okay
Yeah, well, you uh, better make it for three
Oh, see I-I don’t know if we’re gonna be hungry at three
Uh, well, I think, I think he broke up with me
Sometimes, things don’t work out the way you’d thought they would
Oh, hey, don’t you have to go pick up Emily
Hey, y’know what might cheer you up
Y’know, I gotta tell ya, this really does put in a better mood
Oh, I wish there was a job where I could wear this all the time
He’s gonna come by and borrow some candles for his big date
The groom cannot see the bride
Yeah, well, that oughta do it
